lore.unifiedstorage.network_card:
§7"This item links storages and
§7or terminal blocks together"

§4*Don't link a double chest twice!
lore.unifiedstorage.storage_wings:
§7"This item allows you to fly
§7based on how many items you
§7have in your Storage Controller."
lore.unifiedstorage.crafting_upgrade:
§7"This upgrade allows you to
§7unlock the crafting grid"
lore.unifiedstorage.storage_controller:
§7"Use a network card to link
§7various storages together to
§7see it as one unified storage"
lore.unifiedstorage.disabled_crafting:
§fCrafting Disabled
§7Insert a §eCrafting Upgrade Card
§7to unlock this slot.
container.unifiedstorage.upgradeSlotDesc:
§7Upgrading provides a way to 
§7enhance the controller's capabilities.
container.unifiedstorage.crafting_clear_:
§fClear Crafting Grid
§7Returns the items to your storage.
container.unifiedstorage.visualItemSlotD:
§7Providing an item gives a visual for
§7this controller block like an item frame.

§7§o* Putting more of the same
§7§o  items changes the visual.
§7§o  (Only for Blocks)
